name: Contus Group Clone
short_description:
Raised on the Magento shopping cart platform which is believed to be one of the most acquiescent and reliable platforms for commercial purposes in addition to its features of security and safety, Contus Groupon Clone is one of the fastest growing companies offering Groupon clones. It can be installed free of cost and is simple enough to set up. With numerous eye-catching free templates, it has various enhanced features. There is no encryption on the code which makes it fully customizable and user-friendly.

The behavior of customers can be easily tracked and studied by the clients using this software. The customers can login using their social media accounts and share their deals. It owns a dedicated team of members who understand the needs of their valuable customers and who are competent enough to efficiently handle the queries of the customers providing them with solutions at their earliest. It provides one of the fastest front-ends.
summary: An easy platform to build group buying website like Groupon
